extracted_data_phrases: with its teachings , leaders , or members due to frustration

disobedience.description: Rejecting Church unity due to frustration with individuals is sinful because it confuses the Church's divine nature and eternal truths with the human imperfections of its members, while also violating Christ's prayer "that they may all be one."

disobedience.question: Did I use words that belittled, ridiculed, or mocked the Church?
disobedience.description: Mocking the church shows contempt for Christ's established institution on earth, disrespects the Body of Christ, and undermines the Church's divine authority as guided by the Holy Spirit.

disobedience.question: Did I use my words to belittle or scorn the Church?
disobedience.description: Mocking the church shows contempt for Christ's established institution on earth, disrespects the Body of Christ, and undermines the Church's divine authority as guided by the Holy Spirit.

disobedience.question: Did I engage in labor on Sunday when it could have been avoided, thus showing disrespect for the day of rest?
disobedience.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

condoning.question: Did I cause others to feel comfortable staying away from Sacraments or Mass by my words?
condoning.description: One of the spiritual works of mercy is to admonish the sinner and to correct them out of love and charity instead of condoning sin.

extracted_data_phrases: from receiving Sacraments or attending Mass

condoning.question: Did I condone a funeral where a loved one's remains were not buried?
condoning.description: Failing to advocate for proper burial of human remains is considered sinful as the Church teaches that the body is sacred and deserves reverent burial, with scattering or keeping remains being contrary to the dignity of the human body and resurrection belief.

condoning.question: Did I condone a funeral where human remains were not properly buried?

oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my blessings, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others' achievements and successes would somehow be diminished, so I wouldn't feel inferior in comparison?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: to my family members or friends
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to my family members or friends with vulgar or inappropriate language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in positions of authority such as family members or colleagues
of authority such as family members or colleagues
such as family members or colleagues
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others, particularly those in positions of authority such as family members or colleagues, with vulgar or inappropriate language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a way that was unbecoming of my faith
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in a way that was unbecoming of my faith, using words that were hurtful or demeaning?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable for yourself
beyond what is reasonable for yourself
gluttony.question: Did you give in to excessive consumption or overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable for yourself?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, thereby neglecting self-care and moderation?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
perhaps due to excessive social gatherings , special occasions , or habits
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, perhaps due to excessive social gatherings, special occasions, or habits formed through regular meals?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I prioritized excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my family's financial obligations?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: on leisure activities over my financial obligations
prodigality.question: Have I prioritized excessive and wasteful spending on leisure activities over my financial obligations, potentially harming my ability to provide for my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources entrusted to me for non-essential purposes, potentially compromising my ability to provide for family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs , even through casual conversations with friends , family members , or acquaintances
even through casual conversations with friends , family members , or acquaintances
with friends , family members , or acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even through casual conversations with friends, family members, or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private details about others through conversation or social media
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private details about others through conversation or social media, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking about others ' personal struggles or mistakes
about others ' personal struggles or mistakes
gossip.question: Have I indulged in speaking about others' personal struggles or mistakes, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: for tasks that could have been done on another day
impiety.question: Did I engage in work on a Sunday, using the day for tasks that could have been done on another day?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
